page.title: 18ALL ABOUT ME FROM CLAYPOLE
page.content: My name is Joanna Speir. I live at Holme Farm near Claypole and was born on June 6th 1976. I am nine years old. I have blue eyes and brown hair and have to wear glasses. My brother is six years old and is called James. My favourite colours are mauve and pink. My hobbies are swimming, snorkeling, diving, ballet and tap dancing. I also go to Brownies and have so far obtained ten badges. I collect china animals and dolls. I live on a farm which is mostly arable but we have some beef cattle. We have a dog called Brandy, and used to have two more called Scratch and Spot. I go to Claypole Primary School as did my father. I have to come to school by car every day because we live in an outlying farmhouse.
